items.title: Forehead Smoother
items.description: Reduces forehead lines and releases tension from frowning. Regular practice can soften horizontal wrinkles and prevent new ones from forming.
instructions: Place all fingertips horizontally across your forehead.
Apply gentle pressure and sweep outward toward temples.
Repeat 10 times with smooth, slow movements.
Now make a fist and use knuckles to massage in small circles across forehead.
Finish by pressing palms gently against forehead for 5 seconds.
tips: Do this whenever you notice you're frowning
Apply facial oil first for better glide
Combine with deep breathing for stress relief

items.title: Cheek Lifter
items.description: Lifts sagging cheeks and defines cheekbones. Strengthens the muscles that keep your face lifted and youthful.
instructions: Smile as wide as possible, showing upper teeth.
Place fingertips on top of cheekbones.
While smiling, try to push cheeks up toward eyes.
Hold for 10 seconds while maintaining the smile.
Release and repeat 5 times.
Finish by tapping cheeks lightly to increase circulation.
tips: Look in mirror to ensure you're engaging the right muscles
Don't scrunch your eyes - keep them relaxed
Practice while applying moisturizer

items.title: Jawline Definer
items.description: Tightens the jawline and reduces the appearance of double chin. Tones the muscles along the jaw for a more sculpted look.
instructions: Tilt your head back slightly, looking at the ceiling.
Push your lower jaw forward until you feel a stretch under the chin.
Hold for 5 seconds, then release.
Return to neutral, then use fingertips to massage along jawline from chin to ears.
Repeat the jaw push 10 times.
Finish with gentle pinching along the jawline.
tips: Do this while watching TV or at your desk
Chewing gum also helps strengthen jaw muscles
Be gentle - no aggressive pulling

items.title: Eye Firmer
items.description: Reduces crow's feet and firms the delicate eye area. Gentle enough for the thin skin around eyes while effectively toning muscles.
instructions: Place index fingers at outer corners of eyes.
Place middle fingers at inner corners of eyes.
Apply light pressure and look up toward the ceiling.
Squint your lower eyelids up while keeping upper lids relaxed.
Hold for 5 seconds, release. Repeat 10 times.
Finish by gently tapping around entire eye socket.
tips: Always use ring finger for eye area - it applies least pressure
Apply eye cream before to prevent tugging
Never pull or drag skin around eyes

items.title: Lip Plumper
items.description: Naturally plumps lips and reduces fine lines around mouth. Increases blood flow for naturally rosier, fuller-looking lips.
instructions: Make an exaggerated 'O' shape with your mouth.
Hold for 5 seconds, feeling the stretch.
Now smile as wide as possible without showing teeth.
Alternate between 'O' and wide smile 10 times.
Finish by tracing lips with your fingertip in circular motions.
Gently tap lips to boost circulation.
tips: Do this before applying lipstick for better color payoff
Exfoliate lips first for best results
Stay hydrated for naturally plumper lips

items.title: Neck & Décolletage Toner
items.description: Tightens neck skin and reduces horizontal lines. Often-neglected area that shows age quickly - this keeps it firm and smooth.
instructions: Sit or stand with straight posture.
Tilt head back, looking at ceiling.
Press tongue firmly to roof of mouth.
Slowly lower chin to chest while maintaining tongue pressure.
Repeat 10 times.
Finish by sweeping hands upward from collarbone to chin.
Apply neck cream with upward strokes.
tips: Extend skincare routine to neck and chest
Sleep on your back to prevent chest wrinkles
This also helps tech neck from phone use

items.title: Nasolabial Fold Smoother
items.description: Softens deep smile lines (nasolabial folds) that run from nose to mouth. Regular practice can visibly reduce their depth.
instructions: Place index fingers inside mouth, along the smile lines.
Use fingers to push outward while resisting with facial muscles.
Hold for 10 seconds. Repeat 5 times.
Remove fingers. Now smile widely while pressing fingertips on smile lines.
Hold smile against resistance for 10 seconds.
Finish with upward massage strokes along the folds.
tips: Clean hands thoroughly before internal massage
Consistency is key - results take 4-6 weeks
Combine with retinol products at night

items.title: Brow Lifter
items.description: Lifts drooping brows and opens up hooded eyes. Strengthens the frontalis muscle to naturally elevate the brow area.
instructions: Place index fingers just above each eyebrow.
Apply gentle downward pressure with fingers.
Try to raise your eyebrows against this resistance.
Hold for 5 seconds, release. Repeat 10 times.
Now rapidly raise and lower brows 20 times without fingers.
Finish by tapping above brows to stimulate circulation.
tips: Great for before photos or video calls
Don't create forehead wrinkles while lifting
Combine with brow gel for instant lift

items.title: Full Face Lymphatic Drainage
items.description: Reduces puffiness and promotes healthy lymphatic flow. Eliminates toxins and excess fluid for a sculpted, refreshed appearance.
instructions: Start at center of forehead, sweep outward to temples. Repeat 5x.
Under eyes: gently sweep from inner corner to outer, down to ears. Repeat 5x.
Cheeks: sweep from nose outward to ears. Repeat 5x.
Upper lip: sweep from center to sides. Repeat 5x.
Jawline: sweep from chin along jaw to ears. Repeat 5x.
Neck: sweep downward from ears to collarbone. Repeat 5x.
All movements should be light - lymph is just under skin surface.
tips: Best done in morning to reduce overnight puffiness
Use a gua sha or jade roller for enhanced effect
Apply facial oil for smooth gliding

items.title: Face Yoga Cool Down
items.description: Releases all facial tension accumulated throughout the day. Perfect end to your face yoga routine or before bed for relaxation.
instructions: Rub palms together vigorously until warm.
Cup warm palms over closed eyes. Breathe deeply 5 times.
Move palms to cheeks. Hold and breathe 5 times.
Place fingertips on temples. Make small circles 10 times.
Open mouth wide, then scrunch face tight. Repeat 5 times.
Finish by gently pressing all fingertips across face, holding for 10 seconds.
Take three deep breaths with relaxed face.
tips: Perfect before bed to release jaw tension from stress
Add lavender oil to palms for aromatherapy
Do this after screen time to relax eye muscles

items.title: Coconut & Honey Deep Moisture Mask
items.description: Intensely hydrates dry, damaged hair. Coconut oil penetrates the hair shaft while honey locks in moisture for silky, shiny results.
instructions: Melt coconut oil if solid. Mix with honey and olive oil until smooth.
Add essential oil if using.
Apply to damp hair, focusing on mid-lengths and ends.
Massage into scalp if needed for dry scalp.
Cover with shower cap or warm towel.
Leave for 20-30 minutes (or overnight for intense treatment).
Rinse thoroughly, then shampoo and condition as normal.
tips: Warm the mixture slightly for better absorption
Use once a week for best results
Double recipe for long or thick hair

items.title: Avocado & Egg Protein Treatment
items.description: Repairs and strengthens weak, brittle hair. Avocado provides healthy fats while egg protein rebuilds damaged hair structure.
instructions: Mash avocado until completely smooth (no lumps).
Beat egg and mix into avocado.
Add olive oil and honey. Mix thoroughly.
Apply to clean, damp hair from roots to ends.
Cover with shower cap.
Leave for 20-25 minutes.
Rinse with COOL water (hot water will cook the egg!).
Shampoo and condition as normal.
tips: Blend in food processor for smoother consistency
Always rinse with cool water to avoid cooked egg in hair
Use within 1 hour of making

items.title: Apple Cider Vinegar Clarifying Rinse
items.description: Removes product buildup and restores natural shine. Balances scalp pH and closes hair cuticles for smooth, glossy hair.

quickInfo.bestFor: All types, especially oily or buildup-prone

instructions: Mix apple cider vinegar with water in a squeeze bottle or cup.
Add essential oil if using.
Shampoo hair as normal.
Pour ACV mixture over hair, focusing on scalp and lengths.
Massage gently for 1-2 minutes.
Rinse thoroughly with cool water.
Condition ends only if needed.
tips: Use once every 1-2 weeks - not daily
Smell disappears once hair dries
Great after swimming to remove chlorine

items.title: Banana & Olive Oil Softening Mask
items.description: Softens coarse or curly hair while taming frizz. Banana's natural oils and potassium restore elasticity and manageability.
instructions: Blend banana until COMPLETELY smooth (very important - no chunks).
Mix in olive oil, honey, and coconut milk.
Apply to damp hair, section by section.
Cover with shower cap.
Leave for 20-25 minutes.
Rinse very thoroughly - banana can stick.
Shampoo and condition as normal.
tips: Must blend extremely well or banana bits get stuck in hair
Overripe bananas work best - more nutrients
Rinse with warm water, then cool water to seal

items.title: Green Tea & Aloe Scalp Treatment
items.description: Soothes irritated scalp and promotes healthy hair growth. Green tea stimulates follicles while aloe vera calms inflammation.

quickInfo.bestFor: All types, especially irritated or thinning

ingredients: ½ cup strong brewed green tea (cooled)
instructions: Brew green tea strong and let cool completely.
Mix with aloe vera gel until combined.
Add jojoba oil and peppermint oil.
Apply directly to scalp using applicator bottle or fingers.
Massage gently for 3-5 minutes.
Leave for 15-20 minutes.
Rinse thoroughly. Shampoo if desired.
tips: The peppermint creates a tingling sensation - that's normal
Use weekly for best results
Store leftover in fridge for up to 5 days

items.title: Yogurt & Lemon Shine Booster
items.description: Adds brilliant shine to dull, lackluster hair. Yogurt smooths the cuticle while lemon juice adds natural highlights and shine.
instructions: Mix yogurt with lemon juice until smooth.
Add honey and coconut oil. Stir well.
Apply to clean, damp hair.
Focus on mid-lengths and ends where dullness shows most.
Cover with shower cap.
Leave for 15-20 minutes.
Rinse thoroughly with cool water. Condition ends.
tips: Lemon can lighten hair slightly - test first if concerned
Use full-fat yogurt for more moisture
Don't apply lemon directly to scalp if sensitive

items.title: Castor Oil Growth Treatment
items.description: Promotes hair growth and thickness. Castor oil is rich in ricinoleic acid which increases circulation to hair follicles.
instructions: Mix castor oil with coconut oil (castor oil alone is very thick).
Add essential oils and mix well.
Apply to scalp in sections, massaging thoroughly.
Focus on thinning areas, edges, or hairline.
Massage for 5 minutes to boost circulation.
Cover with old t-shirt or silk cap.
Leave overnight. Shampoo twice in morning to remove.
tips: Use old pillowcase - castor oil stains
Consistency is key - use 2-3x per week for results
Takes 3-6 months to see significant growth

items.title: Oatmeal Soothing Scalp Mask
items.description: Relieves itchy, irritated, or sensitive scalp. Oatmeal has natural anti-inflammatory properties that calm scalp conditions.
ingredients: 3 tbsp colloidal oatmeal (or finely ground oats)
instructions: Grind oats to fine powder if not using colloidal oatmeal.
Mix with warm water to form a paste.
Add honey and coconut oil. Stir until smooth.
Apply directly to scalp in sections.
Massage gently - don't scratch or aggravate.
Leave for 15-20 minutes.
Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Shampoo gently.
tips: Great for eczema, psoriasis, or dermatitis
Can use leftover mixture on face too
Avoid hot water which can irritate scalp further

items.title: Beer Volumizing Rinse
items.description: Adds volume and body to fine, flat hair. Beer's proteins and B vitamins coat the hair shaft and create natural lift.
instructions: Open beer and let go flat overnight (or boil to remove carbonation).
Let reach room temperature.
Mix with apple cider vinegar and essential oil if using.
Shampoo hair as normal.
Pour beer mixture over hair as final rinse.
Massage through for 1-2 minutes.
Do NOT rinse out. Style as normal.
tips: Beer smell disappears as hair dries
Works best on fine, straight hair
Don't use if you have yeast sensitivity

items.title: Mayonnaise Deep Conditioning Mask
items.description: Old-school remedy that seriously works. Mayo's eggs and oil deeply condition extremely dry or damaged hair.
ingredients: Optional: 3 drops essential oil to mask smell
instructions: Mix mayonnaise with olive oil and honey.
Add essential oil if using (helps with smell).
Apply generously to dry hair, focusing on ends.
Really saturate the most damaged areas.
Cover with shower cap and warm towel.
Leave for 20-30 minutes.
Rinse with cool water, then shampoo TWICE to remove all residue.
tips: Use full-fat mayo only - light versions don't work
The smell washes out completely
Great emergency treatment before a big event

items.title: Honey & Oatmeal Soothing Mask
items.description: Calms irritated, sensitive skin while providing gentle hydration. Oatmeal reduces redness while honey offers antibacterial and moisturizing benefits.
ingredients: 2 tbsp colloidal oatmeal or finely ground oats
instructions: Grind oats to fine powder if not using colloidal oatmeal.
Mix with warm water or milk to form a paste.
Stir in honey and aloe vera if using.
Apply to clean face, avoiding eye area.
Relax for 15 minutes.
Rinse with lukewarm water using gentle circular motions.
Pat dry and apply moisturizer.
tips: Great for post-sun exposure or after extractions
Can also apply to body for all-over soothing
Use raw, unprocessed honey for best results

items.title: Turmeric & Yogurt Brightening Mask
items.description: Brightens dull skin and fades dark spots. Turmeric's curcumin reduces pigmentation while yogurt gently exfoliates.
ingredients: 1 tsp lemon juice (optional - omit for sensitive skin)
instructions: Mix turmeric with yogurt until smooth.
Add honey and lemon juice if using.
Apply to clean face, avoiding eye area.
Leave for 10-15 minutes (less if you feel tingling).
Rinse with lukewarm water.
Note: Turmeric may temporarily stain skin yellow - this fades quickly.
tips: Wear old clothes - turmeric stains fabric permanently
Follow with SPF - skin will be more sun-sensitive
Use at night to let any yellow tint fade by morning

items.title: Avocado & Honey Hydrating Mask
items.description: Intensely nourishes and hydrates dry, dehydrated skin. Avocado's healthy fats repair the skin barrier while honey locks in moisture.
ingredients: 1 tsp olive oil or jojoba oil
instructions: Mash avocado until completely smooth.
Mix in honey and oil until creamy.
Add yogurt if using for extra moisture.
Apply thick layer to clean face and neck.
Relax for 15-20 minutes.
Remove with warm, damp cloth.
Follow with your regular moisturizer.
tips: Use overripe avocados - they mash better and have more nutrients
Also great for dry hands and elbows
Make fresh each time - doesn't store well

items.title: Charcoal & Clay Detox Mask
items.description: Deep cleans pores and draws out impurities. Activated charcoal absorbs toxins while clay tightens and mattifies oily skin.
ingredients: 2 tbsp water or apple cider vinegar
instructions: Mix charcoal and clay in a non-metal bowl.
Add liquid slowly, stirring with non-metal spoon until paste forms.
Add honey if using.
Apply to clean face, avoiding eye area and lips.
Leave 10-15 minutes (remove before completely dry).
Rinse with warm water.
Follow with hydrating toner and moisturizer.
tips: Never let clay masks dry completely - this over-strips skin
Don't use metal - it deactivates the clay
Use 1-2x per week maximum

items.title: Banana & Honey Anti-Aging Mask
items.description: Softens fine lines and provides antioxidant protection. Banana's vitamins A, E, and potassium nourish aging skin naturally.
ingredients: Optional: ½ tsp vitamin E oil
instructions: Mash banana until completely smooth.
Mix in honey and yogurt until creamy.
Add vitamin E oil if using.
Apply to clean face, neck, and décolletage.
Relax for 15 minutes.
Rinse with lukewarm water.
Follow with serum and moisturizer.
tips: The riper the banana, the more nutrients it contains
Can add a pinch of turmeric for extra glow
Use weekly for cumulative benefits

items.title: Coffee Grounds Exfoliating Mask
items.description: Physically exfoliates while caffeine stimulates circulation. Leaves skin glowing and temporarily tightened. Great morning pick-me-up.
ingredients: 1 tbsp coconut oil or olive oil
instructions: Mix coffee grounds with oil until combined.
Add honey and cocoa powder if using.
Apply to damp face using gentle circular motions.
Massage for 1-2 minutes, avoiding eye area.
Leave as mask for additional 5 minutes.
Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
Follow with moisturizer.
tips: Use fine grounds to avoid micro-tears
Not for sensitive or acne-prone skin
Use leftover grounds from morning coffee (cooled)

items.title: Egg White Pore-Tightening Mask
items.description: Temporarily tightens pores and absorbs excess oil. Egg white's protein firms skin for a smooth, refined appearance.
ingredients: Optional: tissue paper for peel-off effect
instructions: Separate egg white from yolk.
Whisk egg white until slightly foamy.
Mix in lemon juice and honey.
Apply thin layer to clean face.
Optional: press tissue paper onto wet mask, apply another layer.
Let dry completely (10-15 minutes).
Peel off gently or rinse with warm water.
tips: Best used before makeup for a smooth base
Don't use if allergic to eggs
The tightening effect lasts several hours

items.title: Aloe Vera Cooling Gel Mask
items.description: Instantly soothes and cools irritated or sunburned skin. Pure aloe vera reduces inflammation and promotes healing.

quickInfo.skinType: All types, especially irritated or sunburned

ingredients: 3 tbsp pure aloe vera gel (fresh or store-bought)
instructions: If using fresh aloe, scoop gel from leaf.
Blend or mash until smooth.
Mix in cucumber juice and oils.
Apply thick layer to clean face.
Refrigerate mask beforehand for extra cooling effect.
Leave for 15-20 minutes.
Rinse with cool water or leave on as treatment.
tips: Keep aloe vera gel in fridge for instant relief
Can be left on overnight for intense healing
Test fresh aloe on small area first - some people react

items.title: Papaya Enzyme Brightening Mask
items.description: Gently exfoliates with natural papain enzymes. Dissolves dead skin cells without physical scrubbing for brighter, smoother skin.
instructions: Mash ripe papaya until smooth.
Mix in honey and yogurt.
Add lemon juice if using.
Apply to clean face, avoiding eye area.
Leave for 10 minutes only (enzymes are active!).
Rinse with cool water.
Apply soothing moisturizer.
tips: Don't leave on too long - enzymes continue working
Ripe papaya = more active enzymes
Avoid if sensitive to tropical fruits

items.title: Green Tea Antioxidant Mask
items.description: Delivers powerful antioxidants to fight aging and environmental damage. Green tea's EGCG protects and rejuvenates skin.

quickInfo.skinType: All types, especially aging or stressed

ingredients: 1 tsp matcha powder (or contents of 2 green tea bags)
Optional: 1 tsp rice flour for thickening
instructions: Mix matcha powder with honey until paste forms.
Add yogurt and rice flour if using.
Stir until smooth and consistent.
Apply to clean face and neck.
Relax for 15 minutes.
Rinse with lukewarm water.
Follow with antioxidant serum for enhanced benefits.
tips: Use culinary-grade matcha for best results
The green tint washes off completely
Great before a big event for radiant skin

items.title: Lavender Dreams Relaxation Bomb
items.description: Promotes deep relaxation and better sleep. Lavender essential oil calms the nervous system while the fizzing action soothes tired muscles.
instructions: Mix all dry ingredients in a large bowl.
In separate bowl, combine melted coconut oil, essential oil, and coloring.
Slowly add wet to dry, mixing constantly (avoid fizzing!).
Mixture should hold together when squeezed.
Pack tightly into bath bomb molds.
Press dried lavender into top surface.
Let dry 24 hours before removing from molds.
Store in airtight container away from moisture.
tips: Add a tiny bit of witch hazel if mixture is too dry
Humidity affects drying time - may need longer
Makes great gifts!

items.title: Citrus Burst Energy Bomb
items.description: Invigorates and energizes for morning baths or showers. Citrus oils boost mood and alertness while providing vitamin C benefits for skin.
instructions: Mix all dry ingredients thoroughly.
Combine almond oil with essential oils.
Divide dry mixture in half - color one yellow, one orange.
Add wet ingredients to each half.
Layer colors when packing into molds for swirl effect.
Press dried orange zest into top.
Dry for 24 hours.
Store away from light (citrus oils are photosensitive).
tips: Citrus oils can irritate sensitive skin - do a patch test
Perfect for Monday morning motivation
Add poppy seeds for gentle exfoliation

items.title: Eucalyptus & Peppermint Sinus Relief Bomb
items.description: Opens airways and relieves sinus congestion. Perfect when you're feeling under the weather or during allergy season.
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in large bowl.
Combine coconut oil with essential oils and coloring.
Add wet to dry slowly, mixing constantly.
Pack firmly into molds.
Add eucalyptus leaf pieces to top if using.
Dry completely for 24 hours.
Use in warm (not hot) bath for best aromatherapy effect.
tips: The steam helps carry the essential oils into sinuses
Also great as shower steamers - place on shower floor
Avoid if you have sensitive respiratory conditions

items.title: Rose Petal Romance Bomb
items.description: Creates a luxurious, romantic bathing experience. Rose is known for its mood-enhancing and skin-softening properties.
instructions: Combine all dry ingredients including pink salt if using.
Mix rosehip oil with essential oil and coloring.
Add wet to dry, mixing until it holds together.
Press mixture into molds.
Generously press dried rose petals into top.
Dry 24 hours.
Enjoy with candles and wine!
tips: Use food-grade rose petals to avoid chemicals
Rosehip oil is amazing for skin - don't substitute
Perfect for Valentine's Day or anniversaries

items.title: Oatmeal & Honey Soothing Bomb
items.description: Soothes irritated, itchy, or sensitive skin. Oatmeal calms inflammation while honey provides antibacterial and moisturizing benefits.
instructions: Mix baking soda, citric acid, colloidal oatmeal, and cornstarch.
Warm honey slightly so it's pourable. Mix with coconut oil and essential oil.
Combine wet and dry mixtures carefully.
Pack into molds.
Press a few rolled oats into top.
Dry for 24-48 hours (honey makes them take longer).
Store in airtight container.
tips: Great for eczema, sunburn, or post-shave irritation
Use muslin bag to contain oats in tub for easier cleanup
Safe for children's baths

items.title: Detox Green Tea & Charcoal Bomb
items.description: Draws out impurities while providing antioxidant benefits. Great for when your body and skin need a reset.
instructions: Divide dry ingredients into two bowls.
Add charcoal to one bowl (black), matcha to other (green).
Divide coconut oil and essential oil between both.
Mix each separately until proper consistency.
Layer black and green into molds for marbled effect.
Dry 24 hours.
Note: May leave some residue in tub - rinse after.
tips: Charcoal can stain light-colored tubs temporarily
Great after indulgent weekends
Follow with body moisturizer

items.title: Tropical Paradise Mango Bomb
items.description: Transports you to tropical paradise. Mango and coconut nourish skin while the scent boosts mood and provides mental escape.
instructions: Mix all dry ingredients.
Melt mango butter, add fragrance oils and coloring.
Combine wet and dry mixtures.
Pack into molds.
Press shredded coconut into top.
Dry 24 hours.
Close your eyes and pretend you're on a beach!
tips: Mango butter is ultra-moisturizing - skin will feel amazing
Safe fragrance oils only - not essential oils for this recipe
Perfect for winter when you need a mental getaway

items.title: Muscle Relief Arnica & Ginger Bomb
items.description: Relieves sore, tired muscles after exercise. Arnica reduces inflammation while ginger warms and soothes aching joints.
ingredients: ½ cup Epsom salt (extra for muscle relief)
instructions: Mix all dry ingredients, using extra Epsom salt.
Combine arnica oil, coconut oil, and essential oils.
Add wet to dry, mixing well.
Pack firmly into molds.
Dry 24 hours.
Use in warm bath after workouts - soak at least 20 minutes.
tips: Don't use if you have open cuts or wounds (arnica)
Add extra Epsom salt directly to bath water too
Great for athletes, dancers, or anyone with physical jobs

items.title: Kids' Surprise Rainbow Bomb
items.description: Makes bath time fun and exciting for kids. Multiple colors create a rainbow effect in water, and hidden surprise encourages bathing.
ingredients: ½ cup cornstarch (no Epsom salt for kids)
Multiple food colors (red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple)
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Divide into 6 portions.
Color each portion a different rainbow color.
Add a bit of coconut oil and fragrance to each.
Layer colors in mold, starting with purple on outside.
Place small toy in center before final layers.
Pack tightly and dry 24 hours.
Watch kids' excitement as colors swirl and toy appears!
tips: Use only body-safe, non-toxic colorings
Ensure toy is bath-safe and appropriate size
Skip essential oils for young children

items.title: Sleepy Time Moon Milk Bomb
items.description: Prepares body and mind for restful sleep. Chamomile and vanilla create a cozy, drowsy atmosphere for bedtime routines.
instructions: Mix all dry ingredients including milk powder.
Divide in half - color one pale blue, leave other white.
Add oils to both portions.
Swirl colors together when packing into molds (moon shape if you have it).
Press chamomile flowers into top.
Dry 24 hours.
Use 1-2 hours before bed with low lighting.
tips: Milk powder makes water incredibly soft
Pair with no-screen time for best sleep
The vanilla-chamomile combo is scientifically calming
